Title: Provides a deduction in determining personal income tax for the cost of textbooks at a New York private or public college or university
Summary: Provides a deduction in determining personal income tax for the cost of textbooks at a New York private or public college or university by a taxpayer or such taxpayer's eligible dependent; defines "eligible dependent" and "qualified education expenses".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a deduction in determining personal income tax for the cost of textbooks at New York public and private colleges and universities
